ygData.subject: Re: Looking for Item
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/30/99 10:57:28 AM Pacific Daylight Time, MFerrulo@aol.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/30/99 10:57:28 AM Pacific Daylight Time,
MFerrulo@... writes:

<< I have seen one PC and one NPC that have what looks like a glowing,
flashing
shield on thier left arm. When I inspected the PC with this flashing thing
going on, she had a "Light Globe" (not Lightstone) in one of her melee
slots,
so I assume it was not a shiled but rather a light source. I really wanna
try to get one of these Light Globes. Any one know where I can? >>


I think this is the summon light globe spell a wiz can get at like level one.
